div.h3: Ray-Pec offers meal service during school closure

div.p: For families who rely on school meals, to-go breakfast and lunch will be provided at no charge to any Ray-Pec student during the school closure.
• 8:30 to 10 a.m.: Pick up breakfast and lunch.
Ray-Pec students can be served at any of the sites listed below.

• Peculiar Elementary School
• Eagle Glen Elementary School
• Raymore Elementary School
To sign up for meal service, contact Sarah Chellberg, Director of Child Nutrition, at sarah.chellberg@raypec.org.
If you are unable to pick up to-go meals, please contact Dr. Bryan Pettengill, Assistant Superintendent for Administrative Services, at bryan.pettengill@raypec.org.
Meals are available at three sites. The Raymore Elementary site is pictured here.
